caravan.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a vehicle that a car can pull and in which people can live and sleep when they are on holiday
caravan.translation[0].definitions[0].no: caravan site/park (=area of land where people can park their caravans)
caravan.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a covered vehicle that is pulled by a horse, and in which people can live
caravan.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a group of people with animals or vehicles who travel together for safety, especially through a desert
